entry.title: Rust library for joinstr (coinjoin implementation)
entry.summary: Pythcoiner recently shared insights on Twitter regarding the rust implementation of joinstr, a library aimed at facilitating the development of applications for coinjoin. This tool is currently in an experimental phase, with efforts underway to construct bindings. Developers with an interest in privacy tools are encouraged to review and test this emerging library. For those seeking more information or wishing to discuss the protocol further, Pythcoiner is open to communication via email or through joining the simplex chat. This initiative reflects a broader engagement with developers subscribed to the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, emphasizing the collaborative effort to enhance privacy within digital currency transactions.
